messages.location: Maple Ridge, BC, åŠ æ‹¿å¤§ Canada

messages.message: I was really happy to know that you were going to start your world tour. Who would have thought that your first concert would encounter such a thing? I was really heartbroken when I saw the video of you bowing  on the stage with tears in your eyes that day. Later, I saw that you launched such a generous compensation plan, I was really shocked and moved by your kindness and sincerity. Then I saw that all the rest of your world tour events were very successful and I was extremely proud of you.

messages.location: San Jose, CA, ç¾å›½ United States

messages.message: Dear Shen Shen, I just watched your interview with Tencent Music. I was there in London for the first concert of your 9.29 HZ World Tour.  My heart sank and was broken for you as I can deeply felt how desperately you were to cancel your first world concert that you had been so looking forward to.   I also felt very blessed that I can there to suport you, out poured my love on you, and share my tiny light to bright you up.  This became one of my most unforgettable moment in my diary.  Please take good care of yourselfâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸.  I will see you in London again and I know it will be another wonderful moment to meâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸.  Love you alwaysâ¤ï¸â¤ï¸

A once-in-a-lifetime chance to spend Valentine's Day with you in London was an unforgettable experience. Especially during those times when you needed us the most to accompany you through this most challenging period. May you have enduring good health, happiness, and peace!

messages.location: Palo Alto, CA, ç¾å›½ United States
messages.message: I travelled across half of the world to see you, and I saw you, which is all I wished for. Valentineâ€™s Day 2025 at London O2 is forever a most unique piece of my memory.
